listeners

private final Collection<ThreadWarningSystem.Listener> listeners

DEADLOCK_CHECK_PERIOD

private static final int DEADLOCK_CHECK_PERIOD
The number of milliseconds between checking for deadlocks. It may be expensive to check for deadlocks, and it is not critical to know so quickly.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

THREAD_NUMBER_CHECK_PERIOD

private static final int THREAD_NUMBER_CHECK_PERIOD
The number of milliseconds between checking number of threads. Since threads can be created very quickly, we need to check this frequently.

See Also:
